```{r}
library(survival)
```

```{r}
data(pbc)
```

```{r}
library(bllFlow)
variablesSheet <- read.csv(file.path(getwd(), '../inst/extdata/PBC/PBC-variables.csv'))
variableDetailsSheet <- read.csv(file.path(getwd(), '../inst/extdata/PBC/PBC-variable-details.csv'))
pbcModel <- BLLFlow(pbc, variablesSheet, variableDetailsSheet)
```

```{r}
cleanedPbcModel <- clean.Max(pbcModel)
print(cleanedPbcModel$metaData$log)
cleanedPbcModel <- clean.Min(cleanedPbcModel)
print(cleanedPbcModel$metaData$log)
```
